message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $100, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'll make one more counteroffer: I'll sell it to you for $105.
I'm getting close to giving up, but I really want this product. I'll meet you halfway between $100 and $105. Can you sell it to me for $102.50?
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $104.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll meet you halfway between $100 and $104. Can you sell it to me for $102?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'll sell it to you for $103.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm really close to my budget. I'll make one last offer: I'll meet you halfway between $100 and $103. Can you sell it to me for $101.50?
